movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: What a disappointment. . .
review: To say I was disappointed would be an understatement.  Parts of the movie were great, but every time I started to enjoy it, that damn frog Jar Jar Binks would pop up.  There are no words to describe how much I hate this character. Had I been able to just UNDERSTAND WHAT THE TOAD WAS SAYING, then other flaws would be forgivable. At this point, the only forgiveness for Mr. Lucas will come if, in Episode 2, Mr. Binks is dead, floating in a jar jar.. .
